concept.title: Deployment Architecture
concept.shortdesc: When using SDC RPC pipelines, consider your needs and environment carefully as you design the deployment architecture.

conbody.p:
SDC RPC pipelinesdeployment architectureOne key point to consider:
Use multiple destination pipelines to improve downstream availability To ensure downstream availability, you generally want to deploy multiple destination pipelines. Note that the origin pipeline writes data to a single destination pipeline, but can round-robin through multiple pipelines. By using multiple destination pipelines, you can provide redundancy and avoid bottlenecks with a high-volume origin pipeline:
